channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain on Tennyson Road on the corner, 14th July
item.description:
Drain is blocked by soil (?) and ends up not being able to drain when it rains.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 92, Tennyson Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 14th July
item.description:
NWD WITH LANE CLOSURE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE PLEASE CUT BACK OVERGROWN TREE BRANCHES OBSTRUCTIVE TO TRAFFIC LIGHTS APPROXIMATELY 21 METERS X3 METERS (Overgrown Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa on the grass behind a garage block, 14th July
item.description:

item.title: Broken glass, 14th July
item.description:
Thanks for dealing with this. For some reason the FixMyStreet people never thought of broken glass when they created all the categories, so I end up reporting it as Flytipping.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): College Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
